object.name: removeChatVerification
object.description: Removes verification from a chat that is currently verified on behalf of the organization represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Removes verification from a chat that is currently verified on behalf of the organization represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Removes verification from a chat that is currently verified `on behalf of the organization <https://telegram.org/verify#third-party-verification>`_ represented by the bot. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id
